Rulings.Base:
1. Removing from play this card is a cost.
2. This effect targets the Synchro Monster.
3. You can't target monsters that weren't properly Synchro Summoned.
4. You cannot activate this effect during the Damage Step.
5. If you have multiple copies of "Blackwing - Calima the Haze" in your GY you can activate all of their effects in a Chain.
6. If the monster Summoned by this effect isn't face-up on the field at the end of the Battle Phase, it will not be removed from play.

PSCT.Base: During your opponent's Battle Phase, if you control no monsters: You can banish this card from the Graveyard, then target 1 Synchro Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target, but banish it at the end of the Battle Phase (this is a Quick Effect).
